hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $40+30$ then add $8$ then add $5$:

>$\begin{align}\greenD{48}+\purpleC{35}&=\greenD{40}+\greenD{8}+\purpleC{30}+\purpleC5\\
&= \greenD{40}+\purpleC{30}+\greenD{8}+\purpleC{5}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

Add $48$ and $2$ then add $33$:

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{48}+\purpleC{35}=& \greenD{48}+(\purpleC{2}+\purpleC{33}) \\
=&( \greenD{48}+\purpleC{2})+ \purpleC{33}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $48+35$.**

- Add $40+30$ then add $8$ then add $5$.

- Add $48$ and $2$ then add $33$.
